edu.first.module.sensors

Interface Gyroscope

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Input, PositionalSensor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GyroscopeModule

    public interface Gyroscope
extends PositionalSensor
    Gyroscope sensors that return a position.
    Since:
    May 22 13

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAngle()
      Return the actual angle in degrees that the gyroscope is currently facing relative to its starting position.
      void reset()
      Resets the angle to zero.
      void setSensitivity(double voltsPerDegreePerSecond)
      Sets the sensitivity of the gyroscope for calculating the angle in degrees.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.first.identifiers.PositionalSensor

        getPosition

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.first.identifiers.Input

        get

    • Method Detail

      • getAngle

        double getAngle()
        Return the actual angle in degrees that the gyroscope is currently facing relative to its starting position.
        Returns:
        angle from last reset or when robot was turned on

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets the angle to zero.

      • setSensitivity

        void setSensitivity(double voltsPerDegreePerSecond)
        Sets the sensitivity of the gyroscope for calculating the angle in degrees. Units are volts / degrees / second.
        Parameters:
        voltsPerDegreePerSecond - sensitivity to set the gyro to
